dmca.title: Avixion Networks, Copyright Infringed Material
dmca.body:
nc

  _____  

From: Justin Shattuck [mailto:justin@matrux.net] 
Sent: Thursday, May 12, 2005 8:19 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Avixion Networks, Copyright Infringed Material



Dear Lance Crosby,

 

First, I would like to formally introduce myself.  My name is Justin Lewis
Shattuck and I am the owner of a design firm, PristineWEB, based out of
Tulsa, Oklahoma.  Yesterday afternoon I received notification from an
individual which introduced the fact that Avixion Networks is using an
illegal duplicate copy of a website layout that I created and delivered to a
company, XeoCommunications.  The original work was designed in June of 2003
and can be viewed at http://pristineweb.com/work/plex/plex.html

 

In early fall of last year I resold the rights to use the design to
XeoCommunications, a small Canadian based hosting provider.  I spoke to
Robert, the alleged owner of Avixion Networks yesterday afternoon and he
informed me he would remove the website from his server.  I then formally
emailed him a complaint, along with a Cease and Desist notice for the
content he was hosting.  The proper organization allowed to use this layout
is at http://www.xeocomm.net <http://www.xeocomm.net/>  The duplicated copy
that is infringed can be seen at http://www.avixion.net/index.php

 

I emailed Robert and informed him he had 24 hours from the time of my
previous correspondence with him to remove the content before any legal
action would be introduced.  I prefer to handle this situation without any
counsel or financial harm to either party.  Please investigation this
situation and remove my content from his server, as he does not seem to
respect my works or wishes.

 

Thank you,

 

Justin Shattuck
PristineWEB
